entry.title: "do not forget to switch to elementTree and lxml!"
entry.summary:
• "computers" tags:
  • "python"
  • "xml"

pyXML is dead, as shown in this thread (http://www.nabble.com/PyXML-for-py-2.5-to13477754.html) so, do not forget to switch to more recent implementations, supported on Python2.5. for example, lxml (http://pypi.python.org/pypi/lxml/, or http://codespeak.net/lxml/) or ElementTree (http â€¦
entry.content:
• "computers" tags:
  • "python"
  • "xml"

pyXML is dead, as shown in this thread (http://www.nabble.com/PyXML-for-py-2.5-to13477754.html) so, do not forget to switch to more recent implementations, supported on Python2.5. for example, lxml (http://pypi.python.org/pypi/lxml/, or http://codespeak.net/lxml/) or ElementTree (http://effbot.org/zone/element-index.htm, or http://effbot.org/downloads/#elementtree)
